title: How can a high school student get an article published in a journal or newspaper? - Quora

response.answer_text: Probably the fastest way to get published today is with a well-written letter to the editor or opinion column. Be sure to ask the advice of someone other than your high school pals about the appropriateness of the topic, and the quality of your writing. Until you start to get some success, it is especially important to make a habit of writing at least one 100-word piece that no one has assigned to you EVERY DAY. It doesn't have to be good, it just has to be a habit. Print hard copies and keep a portfolio. You will be amazed when you look through them from time to time how even something done poorly will give you an idea for how to do something better.

My father was the chief paint chemist for Dutch Boy paints. One of his staff was a painter. Om one of the papers my father wrote dad listed him as a contributor. Probably not what the man was expecting when he was hired.
